name: Drought (calicospartan)
description:
Your town is experiencing a potentially deadly drought! It is your job to make sure the town survives. Catch the falling rain water and distribute the water to the town. Trees provide oxygen for the people. The river provides food for the people. Avoid catching the pink acid rain which can harm the trees and river. If you last for 10 days, you win! Good luck, the townspeople are counting on you.

Controls:

WASD to move bucket

Mouse click to select things
